page.title: 08THE RIVER AVON
page.content:
The River Avon flows through part of our D block. The Lower Avon Navigation Trust have cleaned out the River so it is navigable to The River Severn at Tewkesbury and from there to the sea at Bristol. The river is used by holiday barges, cabin cruisers, canoes, many other types of boats and also the Welford Angling Club. Our part of the river flows mainly through Market Gardening and farm land. The farmers and gardeners use the water for irrigation. After heavy rain the river floods and makes the land around it wet and marshy.
Helen and Elaine.
